name: Airpods Pro 2
description: 2nd Generation with Magsafe Case (USB-C) AirPods Pro are equipped with active noise cancellation technology. Transparency Mode: This feature allows you to hear the ambient sounds around you while still wearing the AirPods Pro.

name: Volkano Heaphones
description: These Bluetooth Wireless headphones feature high quality immersive sound and a playtime of up to 24-hours on a full charge, keeping you jamming and comfortable literally ALL day long

name: P9 Headphones
description: High Definition Stereo Headphones, specifically created software, and noise reduction technologies combine to create the astonishing sound protection you need to concentrate on what you need to hear.

name: Redragon H220
description: Use the high precision 40mm neodymium speakers for great stereo sound:

name: Audio-Technica
description: The M-Series ATH-M30x professional monitor headphones combine modern engineering and high-quality materials to deliver a comfortable listening experience, with enhanced audio clarity and sound isolation.
